EnemyInfo.Name: Dachora
EnemyInfo.Description:
Harmless ostrich like creature that runs back and forth. If it runs for long enough, it will perform a shinespark. However, it is not able to destroy blocks like for samus (except for the usual enemy destructable blocks).
The enemy is made of 5 parts. There should be one main part followed by 4 Echo parts. The direction parameter for the Echo parts does set the initally graphics, however the main part overrides it anyways.

Property.Name: Part
Property.Description: Which part this enemy is. There should be one main part followed by 4 echo parts.

Property.Name: Direction
Property.Description: Initial direction the dachora will move. If it runs into a wall it will turn around.
